content: That's really helpful, thanks! I'll definitely follow those tips when digitizing our family photos. I think it's a great idea to involve my mom in the process, too. She'll probably have a lot of great stories and insights to share about the photos, and it'll be a nice way to spend quality time together. By the way, speaking of family photos, I was thinking of asking my mom about some old family recipes that have been passed down through the generations. Do you have any tips on how to document and preserve family recipes?
